attributes.action: Provide no mortgage Bail Outs for reckless borrowers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgusting that at a time when low income earners are being taxed more that this Government is even considering bailing out reckless and greedy homeowners who could not budget correctly. Why should Taxpayers money be used to benefit those who were irresponsible. House Prices are becoming more affordable and this Government wants to interfere with the free market.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
